segments.text: I'm still trying to process everything happening in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer audacity of these children to climb for cookies is quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is really pushing his luck, balancing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way it's tilted, it could easily topple over backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is just standing there, complicit in the whole scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone stopping them from this dangerous activity?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me angry to see such a clear safety hazard ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine if he fell and hit his head on the counter or broke some dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mother is right there, completely unaware of the peril behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s almost unbelievable how engrossed she is in her dish-drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for disaster, quite frankly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could shout a warning to them from my vantage point.
segments.speaker: PAR
